achievements.label: The Songs of Caer Adar
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I eavesdropped on the Aviform Hours and live, still, to sing their songs.

achievements.label: Les Neiges D'Antan
achievements.descriptionunlocked: Neither rags nor riches soothed my soul. But at last I found peace in Hush House.

achievements.label: Look on my Works,Ye Mighty
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I spoke the name 'Calyptra' and lived. I won the last revolution, and I am free.

achievements.label: Apology Accepted
achievements.descriptionunlocked: They had hands, organs, dimensions, senses, affections, passions. I know that now. I made, at last, amends.

achievements.label: A Third Way
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I walked beneath the Sun, and I walked within the flesh. At last I found my final home.

achievements.label: A Reckoning Postponed Indefinitely
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I was hunted. I was afraid. But now I am safe, and prepared.

achievements.label: Map of the Empire
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I plumbed the depths. I plotted the impossible. I completed my masterwork, and mastered the Mansus itself.

achievements.label: Perfectly Monstrous
achievements.descriptionunlocked: Those who go beneath the surface do so at their peril. Those who read the symbol do so at their peril. I went and read and mastered all.

achievements.label: Naming the Shadow
achievements.descriptionunlocked: I have faced my Crime and the Curse it freed. At last, I am whole.
